title: The Intolerable Dr Peterson Part II
description:
More Peterson, more books, more protests. My thoughts on how he has affected my life

Article I referenced: https://www.vice.com/en/article/g5bv3x/penguin-random-house-staff-confront-publisher-about-new-jordan-peterson-book

Follow me on twitter @AndreaLynnLewis
Email me at andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
